### Version history

This page provides information about older or alternative versions of  indicative distribution map for this ecosystem functional group [**{{< meta params.efgname >}}**](/efg-info/M1_3.qmd).
Check the current maps [here](/map-info/M1_3_valid.qmd).

- Web navigation (**code: M1.3.WM.nwx**, version v1.0) in preparation 

### Datasets

Datasets considered for previous versions of the indicative map

- **Allen-Coral-Atlas** (Li et al. 2020).
 - **Corals500m** (IMaRS/USF 2011).
 - **Global-Coral-Reefs-2018** (UNEP-WCMC 2018).

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


|dataset                 |url                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|:-----------------------|:-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|Allen-Coral-Atlas       |<https://storage.googleapis.com/coral-atlas-field-data/training-materials/AllenCoralAtlas_BenthicClasses_v3.pdf>{target='links'} :: <https://storage.googleapis.com/coral-atlas-field-data/training-materials/AllenCoralAtlas_GeomorphicClasses_v3.pdf>{target='links'} :: <https://www.allencoralatlas.org/>{target='links'} |
|Corals500m              |<http://datasets.wri.org/dataset/tropical-coral-reefs-of-the-world-500-m-resolution-grid>{target='links'}                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|Global-Coral-Reefs-2018 |<https://data.unep-wcmc.org/datasets/1>{target='links'}                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |


:::
:::

### Available files

You can download geospatial data for older versions of these maps from the following sources:



Note that you need to login to some services like [mapbox](https://www.mapbox.com){target="links"} or [earthengine](https://earthengine.google.com){target="links"}, and in some cases you also need to request access to the files.

###  License information

Indicative maps have been released with a ![](https://zenodo.org/static/icons/licenses/cc-by-icon.svg){height=20} Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International license. 

But see details of dataset licenses below:

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}

|:-----------------------|:------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|Allen-Coral-Atlas       |https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/                                                     |
|Corals500m              |https://www.wri.org/research/permissions-licensing, https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ |
|Global-Coral-Reefs-2018 |https://www.unep-wcmc.org/en/general-data-license#data_policy                                    |

:::

## References

References used in these versions of the maps.

- Li J, Knapp D, Fabina N, Kennedy E, Larsen K, Lyons M, Murray N, Phinn S, Roelfsema C and Asner G (2020) *A global coral reef probability map generated using convolutional neural networks. * **Coral Reefs**  39 (6), pp. 1805-1815 [DOI:10.1007/s00338-020-02005-6](http:dx.doi.org/10.1007/s00338-020-02005-6) 
 - UNEP-WCMC, WorldFish Centre, WRI, TNC  (2020) **Global distribution of warm-water coral reefs, compiled from multiple sources including the Millennium Coral Reef Mapping Project.** Version 4.0. Cambridge (UK): UN Environment World Conservation Monitoring Centre. [Dataset](http://data.unep-wcmc.org/datasets/1) 
 - Institute for Marine Remote Sensing, University of South Florida  (2011) *Global Coral Reefs composite dataset* **Reefs at Risk Revisited project**  Compiled from multiple sources, incorporating products from the Millennium Coral Reef Mapping Project prepared by IMaRS/USF and IRD.
